SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.elements

Class ElementFactory<D extends Dim>

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.bukovja4.engine.elements.ElementFactory<D>
Type Parameters:
D - The dimensional type for created elements
public class ElementFactory<D extends Dim> extends Object
Factory for creating game elements based on dimension and type. Provides functionality to instantiate different elements with appropriate dimensions.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if dimension is not supported
